name: pnp-list-tenant-wide-extensions
title: CLI - List all tenant-wide extensions
shortDescription: This script lists all tenant-wide extensions deployed in the tenant.
longDescription: The following script lists all tenant-wide extensions deployed in the tenant. The sample returns the Id, Title, Extension Location and Extension Disabled status of each extension.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
